text: Louis Stephen St. Laurent (Saint-Laurent or St-Laurent in French, baptized Louis-Étienne St-Laurent; 1 February 1882 – 25 July 1973) was the sixteenth prime minister of Canada, from 15 November 1948 to 21 June 1957. Category:1882 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Privy Councillors (Canada) Category:Politicians from Quebec Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Canada) Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Quebec Category:Canadian King's Counsel
title: Louis St. Laurent
